predicate.note: Frames file for 'travel' based on setences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: This summer, the industry introduced a ``kids fly free'' program, in which children were allowed to fly free if they were traveling with an adult.

example.name: prepositional path
example.text: The shocks generated nerve impulses that [*T*-306] traveled via spine to brain and showed up clearly on a brain-wave monitor, indicating no damage to the delicate spinal tissue.
